sentences: The Role:
We are seeking an experienced PowerApps Developer to join our dynamic team at Alcority
The successful candidate will be responsible for developing new and supporting existing PowerApps, assisting with design, and deploying custom solutions using the Microsoft Power Platform
They will report to the Product Owner for PowerApps within Business Applications
The role requires a deep understanding of Microsoft PowerApps, Power Automate, and Power BI and will be expected to support PowerApps which are already in use on the estate
Key Responsibilities:
Develop and deploy PowerApps solutions from scratch
Document everything that has been developed
Design, develop and maintain custom workflows and automation using Power Automate
Support PowerApps in a high-availability, high-reliability environment, being available on Sundays during the F1 season
Utilize Power BI to create visualizations and reports
Collaborate with Business Analysts, Key Stakeholders and Product Owner to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions
Work with SharePoint Online and Microsoft Dynamics 365 to integrate PowerApps solutions
Provide training and support to end-users
Stay up-to-date with the latest Microsoft Power Platform updates and trends
Troubleshoot and maintain existing PowerApps solutions
Qualifications:
University degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field

3-5 years of experience in PowerApps development with a proven track record of creating successful Canvas as well as Model-Driven apps using industry standard design patterns and practices across a variety of connectors
Full understanding of the PowerApps Studio and how to create functional, responsive and attractive UX experiences
Good developmental hygiene with writing documentation and commenting what you create
Experience working on AGILE/SCRUM projects
Expert general knowledge and experience of Power Automate, and Power BI
Strong experience with SharePoint Online and MS Dynamics 365
Experience with Dataverse and other Premium features of the Power Platform
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to create detailed development, process and training documents
A self-starter with the ability to work independently or as part of a team
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Advantageous:
Experience with PowerApps portals/Pages
Experience with Power Virtual Agents
Familiarity with Jira and Confluence
If you are a passionate PowerApps Developer who loves working with cutting-edge technology and enjoys collaborating with a team, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity
